name: MergeTree表插入的数据块数
note: 插入到MergeTree表的数据块数。每个块形成一个数据部分

translation.name: MergeTree表插入的数据块数
translation.note: 插入到MergeTree表的数据块数。每个块形成一个数据部分

translation.name: Number of data blocks inserted into the MergeTree table
translation.note: The number of data blocks inserted into the MergeTree table. Each block forms a data portion

name: MergeTree表插入的未压缩字节数
note:
插入到MergeTree表的未压缩字节数（列以它们在内存中存储的形式）

在ClickHouse数据库中，当数据被插入到MergeTree系列表（包括ReplicatedMergeTree等）时，在数据实际被写入磁盘并经过压缩处理之前，在内存中以原始格式暂存时所占用的字节数量。这里的“未压缩”意味着数据还未经过ClickHouse为了节省存储空间而在存储阶段执行的列式存储压缩算法处理

translation.name: MergeTree表插入的未压缩字节数
translation.note:
插入到MergeTree表的未压缩字节数（列以它们在内存中存储的形式）

在ClickHouse数据库中，当数据被插入到MergeTree系列表（包括ReplicatedMergeTree等）时，在数据实际被写入磁盘并经过压缩处理之前，在内存中以原始格式暂存时所占用的字节数量。这里的“未压缩”意味着数据还未经过ClickHouse为了节省存储空间而在存储阶段执行的列式存储压缩算法处理

translation.name: Number of uncompressed bytes inserted by the MergeTree table
translation.note:
Number of uncompressed bytes inserted into the MergeTree table (columns in the form they are stored in memory) 
 
In a ClickHouse database, when data is inserted into a MergeTree series table (including ReplicatedMergeTree, etc.), the number of bytes occupied when it is temporarily stored in the original format in memory before the data is actually written to disk and compressed. "Uncompressed" here means that the data has not been processed by the columnar storage compression algorithm that ClickHouse executes during the storage phase to save storage space

translation.note: Number of rows inserted into the MergeTree table

translation.name: TCP Connections
translation.note: Number of connections to TCP servers (clients with local interfaces), including server-server connections

translation.note: 目前正在生成的部分，不在数据部分列表中

name: 从文件描述符读取次数

name: 从文件描述符读取的字节数
note: 从文件描述符读取的字节数。如果文件是压缩的，这将显示压缩后的数据大小

translation.note: 从文件描述符读取的字节数。如果文件是压缩的，这将显示压缩后的数据大小

translation.name: Number of bytes read from file descriptor
translation.note: The number of bytes read from the file descriptor. If the file is compressed, this will show the size of the compressed data

name: 保留空间
note: 为当前运行的后台合并保留的磁盘空间。它略大于当前合并部分的总大小

translation.name: 保留空间
translation.note: 为当前运行的后台合并保留的磁盘空间。它略大于当前合并部分的总大小

translation.name: Reserve space
translation.note: Disk space reserved for the currently running background merge. It is slightly larger than the total size of the current merged portion

name: 复制部分合并次数
note: ReplicatedMergeTree表的数据部分成功合并的次数

translation.name: 复制部分合并次数
translation.note: ReplicatedMergeTree表的数据部分成功合并的次数

translation.name: Number of copy partial merges

name: 复制部分数据丢失次数
note: 数据在任何副本上都不存在的次数（即使是现在离线的副本）。这些数据部分肯定丢失了。由于异步复制（如果未启用配额插入），当写入数据部分的副本失败并且在故障后重新联机时不包含该数据部分，这是正常现象

translation.name: 复制部分数据丢失次数
translation.note: 数据在任何副本上都不存在的次数（即使是现在离线的副本）。这些数据部分肯定丢失了。由于异步复制（如果未启用配额插入），当写入数据部分的副本失败并且在故障后重新联机时不包含该数据部分，这是正常现象

translation.name: Number of data losses in the replication part
translation.note: The number of times the data does not exist on any copy (even the copy that is now offline). These data parts must have been lost. Due to asynchronous replication (if quota insertion is not enabled), it is normal that the data part is not included when a copy of the data part fails to be written and comes back online after the failure

name: 延迟插入阻塞的平均等待时间

translation.name: Average latency of delayed insertion blocking
translation.note: Total waiting time (milliseconds) when the block of INSERT to MergeTree table is restricted due to the number of active data parts of the partition
